services
Class Odometer

java.lang.Object
  services.Odometer

public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Object

Odometer -> keeps track of the robot's current position modified from the odometer code given in Lab 4

 void adjustPosition(double dx, double dy, double dTheta)
          Adjust the current position by:
 Position getPosition()
          Returns the current position of the robot, as according to the odometer

 void setPosition(Position pos)
          Sets the current position of the odometer
 void timedOut()
          Updates the odometer every UPDATE_PERIOD , based on the change in displacement and heading from Drive Ensures theta is normalized between [0, 2PI)
